Package com.CMPUT301W20T24.OnMyWay

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    CurrentUserInfoPulledListener
    Implement this interface and onCurrentUserInfoPulled will be called after the information for the currently logged in user is fetched
    LoginListener
    Implement this interface and the methods will be called after login method finishes (before other user information is fetched)
    UserInfoPulledListener
    Implement this interface and onUserInfoPulled will be called after the information for the specified user is fetched
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CurrentRequest  
    CustomListDriverRequest  
    DBManager
    Manages communication with Firebase Auth and Firestore so other classes don't have to.
    DriverActivityTests
    Tests for the DriverActivityTests class.
    DriverMapActivity  
    DriverMapActivityTest
    Tests the UI of Rider Cost Activity
    DriverViewRequests  
    dummyRequest  
    EditProfileActivity
    An activity that allows the user to edit their profile information.
    InputValidator
    A static class responsible for validating various types of text inputs.
    InputValidatorTests
    Tests for the InputValidator class.
    LoginActivity
    A login page for the user.
    MainActivity
    An activity for quick testing of activities and fragments.
    Offer  
    QRBuck
    To-be implemented Class is responsible for generating QR codes
    Rating  
    Request
    //Request model that holds the blueprint for this object type.
    RequestFormFragment  
    ResponseStatus  
    ResponseStatusTests
    Tests for the ResponseStatus class.
    RiderCost
    This screen is displayed after a driver has accepted a request a cost will be calculated on the basis of the distance between locations
    RiderCostActivityTest
    Tests the UI of Rider Cost Activity
    RiderMapActivity
    A map for the user to create a request and specify the start and end locations.
    RiderViewRideDetails  
    ShowProfileFragment
    A dialog fragment that shows a given user's profile information
    SignUp
    Class is responsible for handling the sign up procedure for any new rider
    SplashScreenActivity
    This is the first screen the user sees.
    State
    Stores objects needed for the global state of the application (objects shared between multiple activities, classes in the app simultaneously like current user, current request, etc.).
    User
    An class used to represent users of the app (either drivers or riders)
    UserTests
    Tests for the User class.
    Utilities  
    UtilitiesTests
    Tests for the Utilities class.
